statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 4 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 16 \\ 6 \\ -2 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 4 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 16 \\ 6 \\ -2 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
